name: Stanford University
description: A top private university near Silicon Valley, known for innovation and leadership in technology, business, and the humanities. Its alumni include numerous tech founders, scholars, and global leaders.

name: University of California, Berkeley
description: A leading public university renowned for its rigorous academics, activism, and pioneering research. It has produced Nobel laureates, influential thinkers, and social change movements.

name: Massachusetts Institute of Technology
description: A global leader in science, engineering, and technology education and research. MIT is celebrated for innovation, entrepreneurship, and shaping the future of industries.

name: University of California, San Diego
description: A coastal research university known for its strengths in oceanography, biotechnology, and engineering. UCSD fosters interdisciplinary collaboration and forward-thinking science.

name: University of California, Los Angeles
description: A top public university known for excellence in medicine, engineering, arts, and athletics. Its vibrant campus life and location in Los Angeles make it a hub of culture and innovation.

name: Harvard University
description: An Ivy League university in Cambridge, Massachusetts, known for academic rigor and a legacy of leadership. Harvard excels in fields like law, medicine, business, and the social sciences.

name: Yale University
description: A historic Ivy League institution in Connecticut with strengths in liberal arts, law, and the performing arts. Yale is known for its collegiate traditions and cultural influence.
